column1:
unit app. = unit as applicable, i.e.
- the unit "billion EUR" does apply for "At current prices"
- the unit "2015=100" does apply for "Price-adjusted, chain
  index".

Gross domestic product per inhabitant:
The unit "EUR" does apply for "At current prices".

Gross domestic product (change in %):
- Non-adjusted values:
  Change on previous year's quarter in %.
- X13 JDemetra+ / BV4.1 calendar- and seasonally adjusted
  values:
  Change on previous quarter in %.
